title: Kimchi jun (Kimchi pancake)
ingredients: ['150g kimchi, drained and chopped', '125ml reserved juice from kimchi', '125g plain flour', '2 eggs', '1 spring onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon sesame oil', '1/2 teaspoon Korean chilli flakes (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds (optional)']
